title: stakrpro
author: stakrpro
content: OverviewStakrPro is a decentralized, auto staking protocol,  using  the Buy-hold-earn mechanism to generate passive income from Dynamic APY Staking,  even during the bear market. We've set two rules to protect our investors;  1. Price impact limitations StakrPro offers a sustainable ecosystem and a very promising passive income.  The ecosystem is backed by full buy-back and burn contract to increase price appreciation and reduce the total supply, ensuring a healthy trend.
